question_text: What is PHP primarily known for in the realm of web development?

answers.answer_text: PHP is primarily known for its use in artificial intelligence and machine learning.
PHP is primarily known for its role as a server-side scripting language in web development.
PHP is primarily known for its use in mobile app development.
PHP is primarily known for its role in computer graphics and gaming.

question_text: When was PHP originally created, and by whom?

answers.answer_text: PHP was originally created in the 1990s by Mark Zuckerberg.
PHP was originally created in the early 2000s by Linus Torvalds.
PHP was originally created in the 1980s by Tim Berners-Lee.
PHP was originally created in 1994 by Rasmus Lerdorf.

question_text: Which symbol indicates the start of PHP code in a PHP script?

answers.answer_text: <script>
<?php

question_text: What is the correct way to comment a single-line comment in PHP?

answers.answer_text: /* This is a comment /
# This is a comment #
// This is a comment
<!-- This is a comment -->

question_text: Which of the following best describes the role of PHP in web development?

answers.answer_text: PHP is a server-side scripting language used for developing dynamic web applications and generating HTML content.
PHP is primarily used for creating 3D graphics and website animations.
PHP is a client-side scripting language that enhances user interactions in web browsers.
PHP is a markup language used to define web page structure and layout.

question_text: Which of the following is one of the key features of Laravel?

answers.answer_text: Laravel is a purely client-side framework.
Laravel provides built-in support for database management and migrations.
Laravel is a low-level programming language.
Laravel focuses exclusively on front-end development.

answers.answer_text: Eloquent ORM manages and interacts with databases using object-oriented syntax.
Eloquent ORM is used to create user interfaces in Laravel.
Eloquent ORM is used to compile JavaScript code in Laravel applications.
Eloquent ORM is used for server configuration in Laravel.

question_text: What is one of the key advantages of using PHP in web development?

answers.answer_text: One of the key advantages of using PHP is its ability to create virtual reality experiences on the web.
One of the key advantages of using PHP is its compatibility with only a single web server.
One of the key advantages of using PHP is its ease of embedding within HTML code, allowing for dynamic web content.
One of the key advantages of using PHP is its exclusive focus on front-end web development.

question_text: What is the significance of PHP's open-source nature in web development?

answers.answer_text: PHP's open-source nature allows developers to access, modify, and contribute to its source code, fostering a vibrant and collaborative developer community.
PHP's open-source nature primarily means it can only be used for personal projects, not commercial applications.
PHP's open-source nature signifies that it is a closed and proprietary language.
PHP's open-source nature primarily restricts its use to academic institutions and non-profit organizations.

question_text: What does the acronym "PHP" originally stand for?

answers.answer_text: PHP originally stands for "Personal Home Page."
PHP originally stands for "Professional Hosting Platform."
PHP originally stands for "Public Hypertext Parser."
PHP originally stands for "Programming High Performance."

question_text: What is the purpose of the PHP closing tag in a PHP script?

answers.answer_text: The closing tag is mandatory and must be included in every PHP script.
The closing tag is used to end a PHP comment.
The closing tag denotes the end of a PHP statement.
The closing tag is optional and can be omitted in PHP scripts.

$my-variable
$my_variable
$my variable

question_text: What is the purpose of the PHP echo statement?

answers.answer_text: The echo statement is used to declare variables in PHP.
The echo statement outputs text or variables to the web page.
The echo statement is used to include external PHP files.
The echo statement is used to define functions in PHP.
